content:
Diagnosis
	1. Pancreatic ductal adenocarcinoma
	Date of diagnosis
	January 2024

	Treatment aim
	Curative

	Summary of completed treatment and relevant dates

	Surgery
	15 Jan 2024 Whipple's procedure

	Chemotherapy
	1 Mar 2024 - ongoing adjuvant modified FOLFIRINOX

	Clinical studies
	None

	Current disease status
	No evidence of disease

	Current issues
	None significant

	Summary of consultation
	Reviewed today prior to cycle 4 of adjuvant modified FOLFIRINOX. Tolerating treatment well with good performance status (ECOG PS 0). Weight stable at 72kg. Recent CT shows no evidence of recurrence. Blood tests, including CA19-9, within normal range. Examination unremarkable with well-healed surgical scar.

	Further investigations
	Routine CT chest/abdomen/pelvis after completion of chemotherapy

	Medication prescribed
	Continue supportive medications as previous

	Follow up
	Next oncology follow up in 2 weeks pre cycle 5

	Required GP actions
	None required at present

cancer_timeline.value: CT shows no evidence of recurrence

status_updates.value: Stage IIB pancreatic cancer post Whipple's procedure. Currently receiving adjuvant modified FOLFIRINOX with good tolerance and no evidence of recurrence
Continuing with cycle 4 of adjuvant modified FOLFIRINOX
CT chest/abdomen/pelvis after completion of chemotherapy
